execution_plan.description: Get the ids of goods that belong to the 'bakery' food category.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE food = 'bakery';

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers that include at least one bakery good (using goods ids from step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get customer IDs for the receipts found in step 2 (one row per receipt). The application will count distinct receipts per customer and filter those with at least 15 bakery visits.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt) AND CustomerId IS NOT NULL;
